description:
This session will introduce the audience to MeeGo and Intel’s programs created to assist developers in creating exciting, innovative apps and making them available to consumers via Intel’s new software store called the AppUp Center. Attendees will learn what’s available through the Intel Atom Developer Program and how to create MeeGo apps for the AppUp Center. The combination of MeeGo and both Intel programs create new usage models for consumers and new opportunities for developers. This talk will also introduce MeeGo and AppUp SDK’s for developing applications targeted to millions of users.

   • Sponsored by Intel
title: Introduction to Developing MeeGo Applications and Taking Advantage of the Intel Atom Developer Program & Intel’s AppUp Center
